vulnerabilities: Potential command injection vulnerability in the 'fs.exists' function
Potential command injection vulnerability in the 'fs.readFile' function
Potential command injection vulnerability in the 'fs.writeFile' function
Potential command injection vulnerability in the 'fs.writeFileSync' function
description: The code is vulnerable to command injection attacks due to the use of user-controlled input in the 'fs.exists', 'fs.readFile', 'fs.writeFile', and 'fs.writeFileSync' functions. An attacker can manipulate the input to execute arbitrary commands on the server.
